description: Construction Managers are global professionals who are involved in a wide spectrum of international building and infrastructure projects. Construction Management is the essential link between the expression of a clientâ€™s wishes, the management of the construction process and the occupation of a building project. Our MSc Construction Management is a fully online programme that offers great flexibility for you to earn while you learn and study where ever you are based in the world. The programme will help develop the skills required for a smooth transfer from design to completion.
